title: JSON schema for Cytoid level.json files

version.description: The version of the level, which should start at 1. For every revision of the chart(s), you should bump the version by 1.

id.description: Unique identifier of the level; must contain a-z, 0-9, . and _ only.

title.description: The title of the song in its original language.

title_localized.description: (Optional) An English translation of the `title` field.

artist.description: The name of the artist(s) of the song in their original language. If there are multiple artists, use half-space comma (,) to separate them.

artist_localized.description: (Optional) An English translation of the “artist” field.

artist_source.description: (Optional) The source of the song; must be a URL.

illustrator.description: The name of the artist of the cover image in their original language. If there are multiple artists, use half-space comma (,) to separate them.

illustrator_source.description: (Optional) The source of the cover image; must be a URL.

path.description: The relative path of the music file.
The relative path of the preview file.
The relative path of the background file.

type.description: Type of the chart; must be `easy`, `hard` or `extreme`. Don't use `chaos`. Please.

name.description: (Optional) Name of the chart. This is basically "custom difficulty name". You can use `CHAOS` here.

difficulty.description: The difficulty of this chart. Must be an integer. Use 0 for `?` and 16 for `15+`.

path.description: The relative path of the chart file.
(Optional) The relative path of the storyboard file.
(Optional) The relative path of the music overriding the main music file for this chart.
